src:
Naslovne strane za sredu, 6. novembar 2019. godine

06 Nov 2019, 07:20

Dnevne novine na naslovnim stranama izdanja za sredu pišu o ujedinjenju demokrata, o istrazi i aferi koja prati predsednika beogradske opštine Stari grad Marka Bastaća, o ekološkim temama i o sudjenju za ubistvo pevačice Jelene Marjanović.ALO  -  "Preokret na sudjenju Jelenu je ubio Dragoje iz Priboja", piše list. Crveno beli večeras dočekuju Totenhem "Englezi u panici: Ne provocirajte Srbe!"BLIC  -  O tome da će se tri stranke demokratske orijentacije stopiti u jednu, list piše pod naslovom "DS se ujedinjuje do 15. decembra". "Policija u opštini, istražuju Bastaća", o navodima o korupciji koji su izneti u javnost protiv predsednika opštine Stari grad Marka Bastaća. O ekološkoj akciji tog lista u Ovčar Banji "Očišćeno jezero na srpskoj Svetoj gori". O sudjenju za ubistvo pevačice "Marjanović promenio iskaz pred sudijom".VEČERNJE NOVOSTI  -  Pod naslovom "Amerikanac dolazi da nam preti sankcijama", list piše da u petak u Beograd stiže zvaničnik američkog Stejt departmenta i da će tema njegovih razgovora biti moguće uvodjenje sankcija Srbiji zbog vojne saradnje Beograda i Moskve. "Uklanjaju otrovni otpad iz fabrike", list piše da će biti dekontaminirane četiri od 14 industrijskih lokacija, i to "Zorka", "Viskoza", "Župa" i "FOM". O početku sudjenja za ubistvo pevačice list prenosi iskaz okrivljenog supruga Zorana Marjanovića: "Jelenu je ubio neki psihopata".DANAS  -  "Otkud u skladištu policije oružje privatne firme GIM", naslov je teksta o pitanjima poslanice Marinike Tepić upućenim javno predsedniku Srbije, ministru unutrašnjih poslova i tužilaštvu. O nabavci novog sistema bezbednosti MUP "Za 2.000 kamera dajemo 13 miliona evra".INFORMER  -  Bivši ruski premijer tvrdi da su generali oko Jeljcina stopirali pomoć Srbiji. "Stepašin: Najveća greška Rusije to što Srbiji 1999. nije dala S -300".KURIR  -  Na naslovnoj strani samo jedna tema "Ultraekskluzivno pismo iz Švajcarske koje rešava misteriju zločina u Borči".POLITIKA  -  "Vučić meri snagu koalicionih partnera" list analizira političku scenu u Srbiji. Povodom vesti da je u podgoričkom Hramu Hristovog vaskrsenja krštena transrodna osoba "Svete tajne i za transrodne osobe". O sudjenju za ubistvo pevačice "Zoran Marjanović: Nema večeri da ne razmišljam ko je zverski ubio Jelenu".SRPSKI TELEGRAF  -  "Hoće da sruše Vučića Opozicija kod Palmera po instrukcije". List prenosi: "Šok na sudjenju Marjanovića sudu stiglo pismo koje otkriva sve o ubistvu pevačice. Ubio je bisnismen Dragoje iz Priboja."
text:
Headlines for Wednesday, November 6, 2019

06 Nov 2019, 07:20

Daily newspapers on the front pages of Wednesday's issues write about the unification of Democrats, the investigation and affair that accompanies the Mayor of Belgrade's Stari Grad, Marko Bastac, environmental issues and the trial for the murder of singer Jelena Marjanovic.ALO - "Turn to trial Jelena killed Dragoje from Priboj ", the newspaper writes. Red Whites welcome Tottenham tonight "Englishmen in a panic: Don't provoke the Serbs!" "Police in the Municipality, Investigating Bastac", on allegations of corruption made against the Mayor of Stari grad, Marko Bastac. About the ecological action of that newspaper in Ovčar Banja "Purified Lake on Serbian Holy Mountain". Trial for Murder of Singer "Marjanovic Changes Testimony Before Judge". EVENING NEWS - Under the heading "American Comes to Threaten Sanctions", the newspaper writes that a US State Department official is arriving in Belgrade on Friday, and that sanctions may be imposed on Serbia because of military cooperation between Belgrade and Moscow. "They are removing toxic waste from the factory," the paper says four of the 14 industrial sites will be decontaminated: Zorka, Viscose, Zupa and FOM. About the beginning of the trial for the murder of the singer, the newspaper reports the statement of the defendant husband Zoran Marjanovic: "Some psychopath was killed by a deer". TODAY - "Where did the weapons of the private company GIM go to the police warehouse" affairs and the prosecution. About the acquisition of a new MUP security system "We give 13 million euros for 2,000 cameras." INFORM - Former Russian PM claims that generals around Yeltsin stopped helping Serbia. "Stepashin: Russia's biggest mistake was not giving S -300 to Serbia in 1999." KURIR - Only one topic on the front page is "Ultra-exclusive letter from Switzerland solving the mystery of the crime in Borca." POLITICS - "Vucic measures the strength of coalition partners" political scene in Serbia. On the occasion of the news that in the Podgorica Temple of Christ's Resurrection, the transgender person "Holy mysteries and for transgender persons" was baptized. About the trial for the murder of singer "Zoran Marjanovic: There is no evening for me not to think who brutally murdered Jelena". The newspaper reports: "A shock at the trial of Marjanovic arrived in court with a letter revealing everything about the murder of the singer. He killed the businessman Dragoje from Priboj."
